languages.text: {n}Самодовольная ухмылка покинула лицо Маражая. Ксенос стискивает рукоять клинка и бросает злобный взгляд на друкарку в искусных доспехах.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Самодовольная ухмылка покинула лицо Маражая. Ксенос стискивает рукоять клинка и злобно озирается по сторонам, задерживая взгляд на темной эльдарке неподалеку.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}The smug grin has fled Marazhai's face. He clutches the hilt of his blade and casts a vicious look at the female Drukhari in sumptuous armour.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Самодовольная ухмылка покинула лицо Маражая. Ксенос стискивает рукоять клинка и бросает злобный взгляд на друкарку в искусных доспехах.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The smug grin has fled Marazhai's face. The xenos clutches the hilt of his blade and scowls angrily, casting lingering glances at the Dark Aeldari woman nearby.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋脸上得意洋洋的笑容消失了。他握紧了刀柄，恶狠狠地看了一眼穿着华丽护甲的女性黑暗灵族。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The smug grin has fled Marazhai's face. He clutches the hilt of his blade and casts a vicious look at the female Drukhari in sumptuous armour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋脸上得意洋洋的笑容消失了。他握紧了刀柄，恶狠狠地看了一眼穿着华丽护甲的女性黑暗灵族。{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの顔から笑みが消えた。彼は刀の柄を握りしめ、壮麗なアーマーに身を包んだデュカーリの女に凶悪な視線を投げかける。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The smug grin has fled Marazhai's face. He clutches the hilt of his blade and casts a vicious look at the female Drukhari in sumptuous armour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの顔から笑みが消えた。彼は刀の柄を握りしめ、壮麗なアーマーに身を包んだデュカーリの女に凶悪な視線を投げかける。{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}La burlona sonrisa se ha esfumado del rostro de Marazhai. Sujeta la empuñadura de su espada y mira con odio a la Drukhari de armadura ostentosa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The smug grin has fled Marazhai's face. He clutches the hilt of his blade and casts a vicious look at the female Drukhari in sumptuous armour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La burlona sonrisa se ha esfumado del rostro de Marazhai. Sujeta la empuñadura de su espada y mira con odio a la Drukhari de armadura ostentosa.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai s'est départi de son sourire satisfait. Le xénos agrippe fermement la poignée de son épée tout en jetant un coup d'œil renfrogné à la Drukhari bardée d'une armure somptueuse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The smug grin has fled Marazhai's face. He clutches the hilt of his blade and casts a vicious look at the female Drukhari in sumptuous armour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai s'est départi de son sourire satisfait. Le xénos agrippe fermement la poignée de son épée tout en jetant un coup d'œil renfrogné à la Drukhari bardée d'une armure somptueuse.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Das hochmütige Grinsen ist aus Marazhais Gesicht verschwunden. Er umfasst den Griff seiner Klinge und wirft einen zornigen Blick auf die Drukhari mit der prächtigen Rüstung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The smug grin has fled Marazhai's face. He clutches the hilt of his blade and casts a vicious look at the female Drukhari in sumptuous armour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das hochmütige Grinsen ist aus Marazhais Gesicht verschwunden. Der Xenos umklammert den Griff seiner Klinge und blickt finster drein, während er immer wieder die dabeistehende weibliche Drukhari ansieht.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzündeki kendini beğenmiş sırıtış kayboluyor. Kılıcının kabzasını kavrayıp şatafatlı zırhını kuşanmış dişi Drukhari'ye saldırgan bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The smug grin has fled Marazhai's face. He clutches the hilt of his blade and casts a vicious look at the female Drukhari in sumptuous armour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzündeki kendini beğenmiş sırıtış yok oluyor. Kılıcının kabzasını kavrıyor ve şatafatlı zırhlar içindeki dişi Drukhari'ye saldırgan bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai
